이전:메인 위:인덱스 다음:타겟

1-메인 제어 버튼
1-2 Quickly deal with players' idiocy.
채팅금지: can take a player name and duration from QB, or just duration for target's chat inability ban.
채금풀기: target or player name are freed from the chan inability ban.
감옥수감: Works like Chat Ban for parameters, but puts a character in prison. If no duration specified, penalty last forever.
감옥출감: Take players out of prison, they appear in Floran Village. Offline players are affected too.
킥: disconnect player from server.
밴: Given a character name in the QB, its entire account gets banned.
밴 해제: Given a player name, its account gets unbanned.
찾기: Show a list of character names matching whatever you specified, or a list/find dialog if none.
복구: some values for the character name you provided will be switched back to safe defaults. Use it wisely!
